roleset.name: discover

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: Medical scientists are starting to uncover a handful of genes which , if damaged , unleash the chaotic growth of cells that characterizes cancer .

propbank.arg: a handful of genes which , if damaged , unleash the chaotic growth of cells that characterizes cancer

example.name: passive
example.text: The problems were uncovered during a series of internal investigations of the company 's Space Systems division , which has been the focus of two separate overcharge prosecutions by the government since 1985 .

propbank.arg: during a series of internal investigations of the company 's Space Systems division , which has been the focus of two separate overcharge prosecutions by the government since 1985

example.name: with 2ry attribute
example.text: The personal antics of agency Director Amadou - Mahtar M'Bow drew much attention , such as when several of his top aides were uncovered as KGB plants and ejected from France and when a mysterious office fire was set just before Congress sent accountants to trace U.S. funds .

roleset.note: UNCOVER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'uncover' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, not actually very similar to 'cover' but basically the same as 'discover'. (from uncover.01-v predicate notes)
